Articles.Content:
Ksp:0.9.0.705

Problem: MKS/FTT Items not showing up in build screen

Mods:

FTT 0.3.1

Kerbonite 0.5.5

Kplus 0.3.0

KSP_AVC1.1.5.0

Mks0.22.8

(All Usi mods Kplus, Kerbonite, MKS, FTT, have regolith in their folders)

(I am using the 32 bit mode)

Reproduction: unzip all mods to the desktop then drag them all to the gamedata folder in your main ksp folder

Launch game (in 32bit mode as suggested) go to space craft hanger and none of the modded items are in the build screen other than a few keronite items

Log:

https://gist.githubusercontent.com/anonymous/70c98ab9bf5693537aef/raw/output_log.txt

you have it installed wrong.

E:\Game Progam files\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Kerbonite\GameData\000_USITools

you have a game data folder in a game data folder, make sure you have all the stuff in the right folder, e.g. the 000_USITools should be in

E:\Game Progam files\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\000_USITools
